name: URL parameter converter
description: Converts URL parameters to event properties

config.name: URL parameters to convert
config.hint: Comma separated list of url parameters to ignore e.g. followerId, referral_partner

config.name: Prefix
config.hint: Add a prefix to the property name e.g. set it to 'prefix_' to get followerId -> prefix_followerId

config.name: Suffix
config.hint: Add a suffix to the property name e.g. set it to '_suffix' to get followerId -> followerId_suffix

config.name: Ignore the case of URL parameters
config.hint: Ignores the case of parameters e.g. when set to true than followerId would match FollowerId, followerID, FoLlOwErId and similar

config.name: Add to user properties
config.hint: Additionally adds the property to the user properties

config.name: Add to user initial properties
config.hint: Additionally adds the property to the user initial properties
